title: M MAELREG Mens Casual Pants with Zipper Pockets Water-Repellent Micro Fleece Lightweight Activewear Golf Pants for Men
description: FABRIC: This mens casual pants is made from polyester-spandex mountaineering fabric with a rectangular brushed lining for a lightweight and soft feel. It's abrasion-resistant, water-repellent, and provides insulation, ensuring comfort in varied conditions all day.

DESIGN: These mens pants casual with pockets feature an elastic waistband with an inner adjustable drawstring for a customizable fit and a clean, stylish look. The unique subtle square pattern texture enhances visual appeal, making you stand out from the crowd.

MULTIPLE POCKETS: These Golf Pants for Men are designed for practicality, featuring multiple pockets for maximum convenience. They include two front pockets for easy access to essentials and two secure back zippered pockets for valuables, ensuring your items stay safe on the move.

OCCASION: These men's casual pants are perfect for golf, hiking, climbing, cycling, running, jogging, and other outdoor sports activities. They are also suitable for workouts and casual daily wear, making them a great gift for husbands, fathers, family members, boyfriends, or friends.

SIZE: SIZE: Our Casual Pants for Men is available in a variety of colors and sizes: S, M, L, XL, 2XL, and 3XL, all in a regular fit. Crafted from soft-touch abrasion-resistant fabric, ensuring unmatched comfort whether you're active or at rest.
